scripts.electron:dev: npm run postinstall:electron && npm-run-all -p ng:serve electron:serve
scripts.electron:linux: npm run build:electron:prod && npx electron-builder build --linux
scripts.electron:windows: npm run build:electron:prod && npx electron-builder build --windows
scripts.electron:mac: npm run build:electron:prod && npx electron-builder build --mac
scripts.emulate:ios-dev: node config/disable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova emulate ios --l -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.run:ios-dev: node config/disable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova run ios --l --device -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.emulate:ios: node config/disable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova emulate ios -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.run:ios: node config/disable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova run ios --device -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.release:ios: node config/enable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova build ios --prod --release -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.emulate:android-dev: node config/disable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova emulate android --l
scripts.run:android-dev: node config/disable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova run android --device --l
scripts.emulate:android: node config/disable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova emulate android
scripts.run:android: node config/disable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova run android --device
scripts.release:android: node config/enable-deploy && node config/postinstall-web && ionic cordova build android --prod --release
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:electron && npx electron-builder install-app-deps
